sentence.Network_en: Often outsize clothes are made from cheap fabric and look like ugly tents.
sentence.Network_cn: 超大号服装常常质地较差，而且看上去好似丑陋的帐篷。

sentence.Network_en: An outsize cotton shoes was mounted on a huge float and paraded through the main street.
sentence.Network_cn: 一双特大的布鞋装在大型花车上在大街上通过.

sentence.Network_en: He was so lean and brittle that his pistols and handcuffs seemed outsize.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是那么瘦弱,连手枪和手铐都显得太大.

entry.def: Outsize or outsized things are much larger than usual or much larger than you would expect.

example.ex: An outsized photograph hung above her bedroom fireplace.
example.tran: 一幅巨大的照片挂在她卧室的壁炉上方。

entry.def: Outsize clothes are clothes for very large people.

example.ex: Often outsize clothes are made from cheap fabric and look like ugly tents.
example.tran: 超大号服装常常质地较差，而且看上去好似丑陋的帐篷。

means.word_mean: 1. an unusual garment size (especially one that is very large)
1. larger than normal for its kind

auth_sentence.content: Outside the Presidential Palace hung an outsize poster of the head of State.
auth_sentence.res_content: Outside the Presidential Palace hung an outsize poster of the head of State.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Outside the Presidential Palace hung an outsize poster of the head of State.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出去.过时,外面"; 2. 表示"超过.过度"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 室外的, 户外的, 野外的
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+door门→adj.室外的, 户外的, 野外的
out出去.过时,外面+er→adj.外部的,外面的,外层的
out出去.过时,外面+going走→走出来→心胸宽→待人友善的
out出去.过时,外面+land地+ish……的→外地来的→奇异的
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out超过.过度+size范围→范围超出
out超过.过度+standing标准的→adj.突出的, 显著的
out出去.过时,外面→adv.出外;在外 v.公布
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+side旁边→在外边
out出去.过时,外面+ward方向→向外的
out出去.过时,外面+break中断→事情断裂→爆发
out出去.过时,外面+door户+s→n.户外 adv.在户外, 在野外
out出去.过时,外面+flow流→流出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 外出, 旅行, 散步
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+ing状态→n.外出, 旅行, 散步
out出去.过时,外面+let表名词→n.出口, 出路
out出去.过时,外面+line线条→划出线条→大纲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 景色, 风光, 观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+look看→n.景色, 风光, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 产量, 输出, 输出量
stems_affixes.word_buile: out出去.过时,外面+put放,摆→放出,输出→产量

out出去.过时,外面+set安置好→在外面放置好→开端
out出去.过时,外面+skirt裙子;引申为城市周边+s→郊区
